title: Ranch house blues
creator_credit: Rodeo Comedies, Pathé Frères, E Derr and Robert De Lacey
brief_description: A Western comedy with musical interludes. Cast includes Don Douglass, Mildred Harris, Harry Woods, Nick Cogley, Billy Burt, Tom Mahoney and the Empire Comedy Four. Script, Robert De Lacey and Hugh Cummings. Photography, Edward Snyder. Music, Josiah Zuro. Editing, Joseph Kane.
